official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on 0,0-dimethyl-s-?(4-oxo-1,2,3 benzotriazin-3(4h)-yl) methyl? phosphorodithioate.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on O,O-Dimethyl-S-(4-oxo-1,2,3-benzotriazin-3-(4H)-yl) methyl) phosphorodithioate.

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on 0,0-dimethyl-s-?(4-oxo-1,2,3 benzotriazin-3(4h)-yl) methyl? phosphorodithioate.
